subject: RE: [junit] @Rule TestName not available in @Before methods...
msgSnippet: Thanks Kent, that would be nice. For my case I moved my @Before code into a @Rule, which made that particular fixture much more reusable. Of course this won t
messageBody:
Thanks Kent, that would be nice.

For my case I moved my @Before code into a @Rule, which made that particular
fixture much more reusable. Of course this won't always be the most
appropriate refactoring.

-barry
--
